summary: Diff implements a new HomePage routed at '/', wires CTAs via TanStack Router, updates BottomNav active-state logic, updates OrderStatusPage “Back to Home” to '/', and adds a HomeLiveCounters component with fallback behavior. However, due to truncation, exact homepage copy/section ordering and zone descriptions/footer copy cannot be fully verified. There are also several extra changes (menu data/page, polling hooks, global theme/palette updates) not explicitly requested.

missing_requirements.requirement: Homepage implements the provided homepage copywriting as five sections in the required order, including the exact CTA labels, the four zone names with their provided descriptions, and a footer matching the provided footer copy.
missing_requirements.reason: HomePage.tsx content is truncated; while the file summary claims five sections exist, the diff excerpt does not provide enough text to confirm exact copy, exact CTA labels, full section order, zone descriptions, or footer copy match the draft exactly.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (describes 5 sections but does not show exact copy)

missing_requirements.requirement: Homepage earth-tone styling aligned to Deep Forest Green, Terracotta, and White Smoke accents (readable in light mode).
missing_requirements.reason: The Live Counter styling uses a blue accent (text-blue-600 / bg-blue-50) for the “100% Listrik Terjamin (Backup System)” counter, which is not part of the requested earth-tone palette guidance.

hallucinated_features.description: New/expanded React Query hooks including a new kitchen queue summary polling hook (useGetKitchenQueueSummary) and broader backend operation hooks.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest focuses on homepage creation/routing/styling/counters; it does not request adding new query hooks or kitchen queue polling.

hallucinated_features.description: Order status polling enhancements (countdown calculation, status transition detection, vibration notifications, in-app notification state).
hallucinated_features.reason: Only navigation behavior change requested for OrderStatusPage was updating “Back to Home” to point to '/'.

hallucinated_features.description: Menu page changes including categorized menu display and a live kitchen queue summary section polling every 5 seconds.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; primary focus was building/routing the homepage and wiring CTAs to existing routes.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/updated static menu dataset containing 14 items.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the homepage build requirements.

hallucinated_features.description: Global theme/palette and Tailwind configuration changes (earthy OKLCH palette, font families Inter/Merriweather).
hallucinated_features.reason: REQ-3 requests vintage-modern styling; it allows limiting changes to homepage if global changes are risky, but it does not explicitly request altering global CSS/Tailwind tokens.
